scripts.taskViewer:dev: concurrently -n "TaskViewer-BE,TaskViewer-FE" -c "magenta,green" "npm run start:dev -w taskViewerBe" "npm run dev -w taskViewerFe"
scripts.kill:all: npm run kill:3000 && npm run kill:3002 && npm run kill:5173
scripts.kill:node: taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>nul || echo "âœ… No node processes running"
scripts.pretaskViewer:dev: npm run kill:3002 && npm run kill:5173
scripts.docs:preview: npm run docs:generate && echo "ğŸ“„ Open docs/public/index.html in your browser"
scripts.ci:lint: npm run lint -w service2110 && npm run lint -w taskViewerBe && npm run lint -w taskViewerFe
scripts.ci:build: npm run build -w service2110 && npm run build -w taskViewerBe && npm run build -w taskViewerFe
scripts.ci:check: npm run ci:lint && npm run ci:build
